Commitment to reducing carbon footprint and supporting low-carbon economy transition
social_issues: Cybersecurity threats impacting clients and business growth
governance_issues: Compliance with ESG-related considerations and regulatory scrutiny
Strong corporate governance practices, including compliance with SEC, NYSE, and Swiss regulations
